subject: JUnit 4.5 Release Candidate 1
msgSnippet: All, http://sourceforge.net/project/showfiles.php?group_id=15278 is release candidate 1 of JUnit 4.5.  We believe that we ve addressed all bugs found by our
messageBody:
All,

http://sourceforge.net/project/showfiles.php?group_id=15278

is release candidate 1 of JUnit 4.5. We believe that we've addressed
all bugs found by our intrepid beta testers. (Robin, Nat, we'd love a
confirmation of that). Please, sometime in the next 48 hours,
substitute the jar in for your current 4.4 installation, and let us
know, here or in tracker, of any problems discovered. If no problems
are found, 4.5 will be live about this time on Friday.

There is one additional feature in this version over beta 4:

- Annotating a class with `@RunWith(JUnit4.class)` will always invoke the
default JUnit 4 runner in the current version of JUnit. This default changed
from `JUnit4ClassRunner` in 4.4 to `BlockJUnit4ClassRunner` in 4.5,
and may change again.

Thanks,

Kent and David
